page.title: 07Principle Feature
page.content: Staverton Golf Course On friday 21st of June , Andrew Barnard,Janie Coles ,Susan Wright, Claire Coxon and myself (Simon Jones) went to Staverton Golf Course. Staverton golf course covers 180 acres and has 18 holes, a tennis court ,a squash court and a swimming pool. They have facilities for children from 7upwards . The membership fee is 75 pounds for the under 16's ,200 pounds for the over 16's and family membershjipis about 500 pounds ,this entes all the familyto play golf, tennis squash and to use the pool. The golf course itself has been open 7 years ,building started in 1975 and opened in 1978 The membership is limited but at the moment (1985) there is plenty of room. Many stars such as Eddie Large and Jasper Carrott have played there.
